document_name_accent: viem duong tiet nieu khi mang thai.json
document_title: Urinary tract infections during pregnancy: Causes and treatments
subsection_name: viem-duong-tiet-nieu-khi-mang-thai.json_3_Diagnosis of urinary tract infections during pregnancy
subsection_content:
When suspecting that you have a urinary tract infection during pregnancy, in addition to examining the initial symptoms, the specialist will ask to perform some of the following tests before recommending a treatment regimen:
Urine test to find bacteria, red blood cells, and white blood cells. This method is usually performed when you are in the 1st trimester.; If bacteria are found in the patient's urine, they will be cultured in the laboratory and tested for antibiotic sensitivity to help determine the appropriate medication.
subsection_title: viem duong tiet nieu khi mang thai.json. Diagnosis of urinary tract infections during pregnancy

viem duong tiet nieu khi mang thai.json. Diagnosis of urinary tract infections during pregnancy
When suspecting that you have a urinary tract infection during pregnancy, in addition to examining the initial symptoms, the specialist will ask to perform some of the following tests before recommending a treatment regimen:
Urine test to find bacteria, red blood cells, and white blood cells. This method is usually performed when you are in the 1st trimester.; If bacteria are found in the patient's urine, they will be cultured in the laboratory and tested for antibiotic sensitivity to help determine the appropriate medication.
